body: Where da fak iz my Miku?
lmao this author is clearly trashy animefag, not the almighty mangafag

Honestly... (no manga spoilers for anime viewers)
1. The father doesn't look close to the anime or manga design though his personality is kinda right
2. Itsuki although her star pins and hairstyle is right, the face and facial expression don't pass (personally), oh also she is THICCER than that so it's kinda disappointing.
3. There's zero plot or story behind this hentai, I mean it doesn't even relate to the dad's role in the manga. 

Overall, I can agree with the sentiment that this is trash however if you like rape doujins in particular or desperate for Quintessential Quintuplet hentai or plainly horny enough then I can see the tiny appeal this might have.

P.S. the Japanese in this hentai is pretty straightforward so I could see the possibility of a small scanlation group translating this in the near future. 

But really with all the 76 chapters of manga out right now, I can think up of so much better rape/NTR/DILF hentai for this series than what this had to offer.
This art is making me laugh at humanity, but I guess that was too harsh
